message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price of $90. I think it's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it!
Hi Alice, $90 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay. I'm happy to purchase this product if you're willing to come down to $75.  Let me know what you think!

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer of $75. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $82.50. I think this is a fair price considering the value the product brings. Let me know if this works for you!
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $82.50 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $78, but that's my final offer.  Let me know if you're interested.

Hi Bob, I understand that $78 is your final offer, but I'm still not willing to sell the product at that price. I'm willing to meet you at $79.50. It's a compromise, but I think it's a fair price considering the value the product brings. Let me know if this works for you!
